About BKNM

Learn about our history, mission, and the people who make our community special.

Our Mission & Vision

Under the auspices of Rav Yosef Weinberger, our goal is to create a vibrant kehillah and makom torah/tefillah with a broad appeal accomplished by organic programming that is experiential and instills passion towards Judaism. We hope we can create a warm, friendly, welcoming atmosphere that allows our families to be religiously inspired and growth oriented.

Community

Building a warm, inclusive community where everyone feels welcome and valued.

Learning

Fostering a love of Torah learning and Jewish education for all ages.

Connection

Creating meaningful connections to Judaism, tradition, and each other.

Our Leadership

Rav Yosef Weinberger

Rav Yosef Weinberger is a Rebbe and coordinator of the Beit Midrash Track in Yeshivat Frisch. He graduated from Yeshiva University's Sy Syms School of Business where he received a BS in Accounting and subsequently completed the CPA examination. Upon graduation, he earned semicha from RIETS, as part of the Wexner Semicha Honors Program, as well as a Master's from the Azrieli Graduate School of Jewish Education.

Rav Yosef Weinberger can be reached at rav@bknm.org.
